dialogs: Hello, young man., I need to tell you something.
The endblock, I completely made it up.
Wait. What are all these guys guarding then?
You are really bad at lying.
Well, at least you won't be able to get past this next part.
You need to climb over the top and get the sword before you can kill the enemy blocking your way.
But I'm sure you'l give up in frustration.
